description: Just a little under 100m from the Sette Querce hotel and situated opposite a lovely viewpoint, this restaurant is housed in the castle’s old stables. The vaulted ceilings and old stone create a charming ambience, while the excellent local cuisine will definitely appeal to the palate.
creditCards: ['American Express credit card', ' Credit card / Debit card accepted', ' Mastercard credit card', ' Visa credit card']
